outcome.description: An ability to apply knowledge of computing and mathematics appropriate to the discipline
An ability to analyze a problem, and identity and define the computing requirements appropriate to its solution
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Demonstrates the ability to analyze a problem, and identify and define the computing requirements appropriate to its solution

outcome.description: An ability to design, implement, and evaluate a computer-based system, process, component, or program to meet desired needs
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Develop design requirements from the problem statement that meet desired needs
Identify relevant, realistic design constraints from the design requirements
Produce a design that satisfies design requirements within relevant, realistic constraints

outcome.description: An ability to function effectively on teams to accomplish a common goal
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Quality of contribution to the team effort

outcome.description: An understanding of professional, ethical, legal, security and social issues and responsibilities
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Knowledge of the code of ethics in the discipline
Recognize the ethical dimension of an issue in the discipline

outcome.description: An ability to communicate effectively with a range of audiences
An ability to analyze the local and global impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Demonstrates an ability to analyze the local impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society
Demonstrates an ability to analyze the global impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society

outcome.description: Recognition of the need for and an ability to engage in continuing professional development
An abiility to use current tecniques, skills, and tools necessary for computing practice.
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Demonstrates an appropriate skil level using a given technique for computing practice
Demonstartes an appropriate skill level using a given modern (current) tool for computing practice

outcome.description: An ability to apply mathematical foundations, algorithmic principles, and computer science theory in the modeling and design of computer-based systems in a way that demonstrates comprehension of the tradeoffs involved in design choices
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Demonstrates an ability to apply mathematical foundations to computer-based systems in a way that demonstrates tradeoffs in design choices
Demonstrates an ability to apply algorithmic principles and computer science theory to computer-based systems in a way that demonstrates tradeoffs in design choices

outcome.description: Able to apply design and development pronciples in the construction of software of varying complexity
outcome.PerformanceCriteria: Demonstrate an ability to apply design and development principles in the construction of software of varying complexity
